verbs.description: [ARG0: pineapple curry chicken curry] [V: has] [ARG1: a moderate to strong flavor] so add it early in the cooking process for good balance with pineapple coconut and ginger —robin haas cranston rhode island curry curry chicken

pineapple curry chicken curry has a moderate to strong flavor so [V: add] [ARG1: it] [ARGM-TMP: early] [ARGM-LOC: in] [ARGM-TMP: the cooking process] [ARGM-PRP: for good balance] [ARG2: with pineapple coconut and ginger] —robin haas cranston rhode island curry curry chicken
